DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate ability SYSTANE® BALANCE SYSTANE® Gel improve comfort subject dry eye .
DOC.brief_title: SYSTANE® BALANCE Symptoms ( OSDI ) & Inflammatory Biomarkers
DOC.criteria: Read , sign , date Informed Consent Document ; Must use topical ocular drop approximately 24 hour prior Visit 1 ; Meet protocolspecified dry eye criterion Screening Visit ( Visit 1 ) ; Intraocular pressure ( IOP ) less equal 22 millimeter mercury ( mmHg ) eye ; Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . History evidence ocular intraocular surgery serious trauma either eye within past 6 month ; Current punctal occlusion type ( e.g. , collagen plug , silicone plug ) ; History evidence epithelial herpes simplex keratitis ( dendritic keratitis ) ; vaccinia ; active recent varicella viral disease cornea and/or conjunctiva ; chronic bacterial disease cornea and/or conjunctiva and/or eyelid ; mycobacterial infection eye ; and/or fungal disease eye ; Use concomitant topical ocular medication study period ; Currently use Restasis unwilling discontinue use 1 month prior screen entire study period ; Use systemic medication may contribute dry eye unless stable dose regimen minimum 30 day prior Visit 1 remain stable throughout study ; Uncontrolled ocular condition uveitis , glaucoma ocular condition may preclude safe administration either drop investigation ; Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
